Rulings.Base: 1. If you don't have an appropriate monster in your Deck to add to your hand, you cannot activate this effect.\n2. There is no Level restriction on the monster you discard to complete this effect.\n3. You can activate this effect even if you don't have a Dragon-Type or Winged Beast-Type monster in your hand beforehand.
